betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The Awakened Ichorium Sword deals 10 attack damage and has three modes:

Single Kill Mode (Green): It attacks normally.

Area Mode (Red): It deals damage to targets within a 3x3 area around the hit target (a total of 9 blocks, centered on the target).

Soul Hunting Mode (Blue): The damage is reduced to 6 points, but every fully charged attack grants the attacker 1 damage-absorbing shield, up to a maximum of 20 shield points.
